entry.title: the boy who cried hunter
entry.summary:
Author: fried_extracrispy_trenchcoat

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,363Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 11

Summary: "Why did you believe me?" Stiles asks later, catching up to Derek outside the police station. He's back to his scowly, bristly self."Because you're right, it was arson. But the police can't prove who did it."I know who it was! Stiles thinks hard at Derek while watching him leave in a sleek black Camaro. But how is he supposed to tell Derek without making himself look totally suspicious? Saying that it’s arson is one thing, but claiming to know who the arsonist is when the whole town was convinced it was nobody's fault?And he had no evidence. While evidence doesn’t always mean truth like Derek said, evidence does get a person places. Case in point: evidence would get a mass murderer like Kate Argent in prison for life.

entry.summary:

entry.title: All Fangs But No Bark
entry.summary:
Author: FyreFlys

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,614Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Derek doesn’t know how this happened to him. He’s forgotten a lot of it. He doesn’t want to remember most of it. All he knows is he’s done bad things. And he really wants to go home. Other than the nightmares, it’s all he dreams about; a kid that has too much to say, and knows so much, with hands that easily scratch into his fur and soothes all his aches and pains.OR: Derek gets abducted by hunters who throw him into an underground dog-fighting and supernatural-weapons-smuggling ring. He manages to escape, and finds his way to the Stilinskis’ doorstep. And slowly, Stiles helps him return to his humanity.

entry.title: Keystone Species
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,836Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 47

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town.His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve.Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away.Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.summary:

entry.title: Lollipop Lanes
entry.summary:
Author: LolliKitty34

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,060Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 12

Summary: It had been a year since Allison Argent, best friend of Lydia Martin and beloved girlfriend of Scott McCall died. And a year since Stiles broke up with Malia and had to endure the Nogitsune’s torturous head games. A lot can happen in a year. Like going to another mental health facility. One that actually helped. And a rather…unlikely person that helped him come out as gay, have a whirlwind romance with and quickly become engaged and then married to a year later. Derek. Derek Hale was his everything. And now their next step was looking for a home together. His PTSD was still acting up as they toured apartments, but Derek will stop at nothing to put a permanent smile on his new husband's face. When a once in a life time opportunity comes up, an add for an apartment above a blank space that used to be a book store….Well…Time will tell if books are really a cure for everything. *ongoing fic*

entry.title: An Unexpected Score
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,694Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 64

Summary: “Oh no… No, no, no! I am NOT signing up to play on your baseball team, Dad. I’m sorry but NO.”Noah crossed his arms, settling into the pose that let his son know resistance was futile.“Stiles, it’s for charity. Nobody’s expecting you to hit a home run, believe me… But we’ve already tried asking everyone else at the station, and now you’re our last hope.”“Did you try threatening to arrest them?”“Son, please… This is for a good cause. We only need one more player.”___Or the one where Stiles is guilted into playing a game of charity baseball and the one person he didn't want there shows up...
